item.title: KR
item.description: score:92 Chances: Kroger (KR) and Procter & Gamble (PG) announcing the opening of application period for their 2024 Game Changers Scholarship is a positive sign for their commitment to education and diversity. The introduction of Cooler Screens’ AI technology in grocery store display cases has the potential to revolutionize in-store advertising and enhance the shopping experience, which could drive more foot traffic and sales for Kroger.
